newsletter_declutter_agent.description: Analyze email newsletters and provide unsubscribe recommendations.
lines: Analyze my email newsletters and help me decide which to unsubscribe from.
1. Scan the last 30 days of emails to identify newsletters
2. Analyze engagement rates for the newsletters you find
3. Extract unsubscribe links for newsletters with low engagement (open rate < 30%)
4. Provide a comprehensive summary with actionable recommendations
Be thorough and provide specific details about each newsletter.
